trans-unit.source: Provides information about a network interface address.
trans-unit.target: 提供網路介面位址的相關資訊。

trans-unit.source: You do not create instances of this class; instances are returned by methods in the <xref:System.Net.NetworkInformation.IPInterfaceProperties> class.
trans-unit.target: 您不會建立此類別; 事件類別的執行個體執行個體中的方法所傳回<xref:System.Net.NetworkInformation.IPInterfaceProperties>類別。

trans-unit.source: The following code example displays the Domain Name Service (DNS) addresses for the network interfaces on the local computer.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例會顯示在本機電腦上的網路介面的網域名稱服務 (DNS) 位址。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Net.NetworkInformation.IPAddressInformation" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Net.NetworkInformation.IPAddressInformation" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: This constructor can be called only by classes that derive from <xref:System.Net.NetworkInformation.IPAddressInformation>.
trans-unit.target: 可以呼叫這個建構函式只能由衍生自的<xref:System.Net.NetworkInformation.IPAddressInformation>。
取得網際網路通訊協定 (IP) 位址。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Net.IPAddress" /> instance that contains the IP address of an interface.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Net.IPAddress" /> 執行個體，包含介面的 IP 位址。

trans-unit.source: The IP address uniquely identifies the interface on the network.
trans-unit.target: IP 位址可唯一識別網路上的介面。

trans-unit.source: The following code example displays the multicast addresses for the network interfaces on the local computer.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例顯示在本機電腦上的網路介面的多點傳送的位址。

trans-unit.source: Gets a <see cref="T:System.Boolean" /> value that indicates whether the Internet Protocol (IP) address is valid to appear in a Domain Name System (DNS) server database.
trans-unit.target: 取得 <see cref="T:System.Boolean" /> 值，指出網際網路通訊協定 (IP) 位址出現在網域名稱系統 (DNS) 伺服器資料庫中是否有效。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the address can appear in a DNS database; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果位址可以出現在 DNS 資料庫中則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Addresses in the range 169.254.0.0 to 169.254.255.255 are not DNS eligible.
These addresses are reserved for Automatic Private IP Addressing (APIPA).
trans-unit.target: 這些位址為保留的自動私人 IP 位址 (APIPA)。

trans-unit.source: The following code example displays the anycast addresses for the network interfaces on the local computer.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例會顯示本機電腦上的網路介面的任一傳播位址。

trans-unit.source: Gets a <see cref="T:System.Boolean" /> value that indicates whether the Internet Protocol (IP) address is transient (a cluster address).
trans-unit.target: 取得 <see cref="T:System.Boolean" /> 值，指示網際網路通訊協定 (IP) 位址是否為暫時性 (Transient) 的 (叢集位址)。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the address is transient; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果位址是暫時性的，則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: A transient address is assigned to a cluster and should not be used by most applications.
trans-unit.target: 暫時性的位址指派給叢集，並不應該使用大部分的應用程式。
